statements: GRANT SELECT ON geospatial_data TO analysts
GRANT UPDATE(location), SELECT(id, value) ON geospatial_data TO editors

GRANT INSERT, DELETE ON spatial_data TO user2
GRANT SELECT, UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE ON locations, spatial_data TO admin
GRANT SELECT, INSERT ON locations TO analyst_role;
GRANT SELECT ON users TO analyst_role;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON geo_analysis TO analyst_role;
GRANT SELECT ON locations TO sales_team
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON regions TO sales_team
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON customers TO admin
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON locations TO user1
